structure.unit: ARTICLE IV. TOWERS, POLES AND MASTS

law.catch_line: Plans and specifications to accompany application for permit.

text.section:
Sec. 33-61. Plans and specifications to accompany application for permit.
Plans and specifications for the structures provided in shall be submitted to the Director showing all dimensions, size and kind of members, footings, guy wires; location, depth and type of guy anchors and footings, type and weight of antenna, apparatus or structures to be attached to or supported by the structure, and application made for permit.
